StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOssWFVPoolCardRows]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId uniqueiden..er = null, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er = null, @ScheduledEventsStart date.me, @ScheduledEventsEnd date.me, @EventTypeID int = null, @OnlyNextScheduledEvent bit = 1 )
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON SET ARITHABORT ON
DECLARE @Organiza.onID INT
SELECT @Organiza.onID = ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE rowguid = @orgid
IF @Organiza.onID IS NULL BEGIN SET @Organiza.onID = 0 END
CREATE TABLE #STATUS_DISPOSITION ( STATUS_TYPE char(1) ,STATUS_CODE VARCHAR(10) ,DISPOSITION_CODE VARCHAR(20) ,STATUS_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(40) ,DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(40) )
INSERT INTO #STATUS_DISPOSITION SELECT STATUS_TYPE ,STATUS_CODE ,DISPOSITION_CODE ,STATUS_DESCRIPTION ,DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.DBO.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd_inner WHERE sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAI') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAP') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAS') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAT') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAU') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBAW') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBR') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBQ') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBW') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBX') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('OBY') OR sd_inner.STATUS_TYPE + sd_inner.STATUS_CODE + sd_inner.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('ODC')
CREATE TABLE #Person ( ApplicantAssetID uniqueiden..er ,ApplicantAssetName VARCHAR(300) ,MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INT ,NWA_ID INT ,RecruiterId uniqueiden..er ,ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT ,SecondaryId uniqueiden..er ,Disposi.on VARCHAR(50) ,Recruiter VARCHAR(300) ,RecruiterShortName VARCHAR(300) ,CreateDate DATETIME ,Source VARCHAR(50) ,SourceDual VARCHAR(50) ,Gender varchar(1) )
CREATE TABLE #Pool ( ApplicantAssetID uniqueiden..er ,ApplicantAssetName VARCHAR(300) ,MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INT ,NWA_ID INT ,RecruiterId uniqueiden..er ,ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT ,SecondaryId uniqueiden..er ,Disposi.on VARCHAR(50) ,Recruiter VARCHAR(300) ,RecruiterShortName VARCHAR(300) ,CreateDate DATETIME ,Source VARCHAR(50) ,SourceDual VARCHAR(50) ,Gender varchar(1) )
CREATE TABLE #NWA ( ApplicantAssetID uniqueiden..er ,ApplicantAssetName VARCHAR(300) ,MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INT ,NWA_ID INT ,RecruiterId uniqueiden..er ,ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT ,SecondaryId uniqueiden..er ,Disposi.on VARCHAR(50) ,Recruiter VARCHAR(300) ,RecruiterShortName VARCHAR(300) ,CreateDate DATETIME ,EventID uniqueiden..er ,EventDate date.me ,Source VARCHAR(50) ,SourceDual VARCHAR(50) ,Gender varchar(1) ,EventTypeOther varchar(256) ,EventType varchar(256) )
CREATE TABLE #FinalResult ( ApplicantAssetID uniqueiden..er ,ApplicantAssetName VARCHAR(300) ,MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INT ,NWA_ID INT ,RecruiterId uniqueiden..er ,ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT ,SecondaryId uniqueiden..er ,Disposi.on VARCHAR(50) ,Recruiter VARCHAR(300) ,RecruiterShortName VARCHAR(300) ,CreateDate DATETIME ,EventID uniqueiden..er ,EventDate date.me ,Source VARCHAR(50) ,SourceDual VARCHAR(50) ,Gender varchar(1) ,EventTypeOther varchar(256) ,EventType varchar(256) )
INSERT INTO #Person SELECT pr.[ProspectId], COALESCE(RTRIM(ps.LastName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(ps.FirstName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(ps.MiddleName), SPACE(0)) AS ApplicantAssetName, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, n.NWA_ID, rp.rowguid AS RecruiterID, n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, n.rowguid, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION AS Disposi.on, COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Recruiter, COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterShortName, c.[CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE], pr.source AS Source, pr.sourceDual AS SourceDual, ps.Gender FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[Person] ps INNER JOIN [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[Prospect] pr ON ps.[PersonId] = pr.PersonId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n on n.rowguid = pr.NWAId INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] c ON c.[NWA_ID] = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro ON ro.[rowguid] = pr.[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = rp.rowguid INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] rcp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = rcp.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs ON n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID AND cs.[CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] = (SELECT MAX([CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID]) FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] WHERE NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN #STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON SD.STATUS_TYPE = CS.STATUS_TYPE AND SD.STATUS_CODE = CS.STATUS_CODE AND SD.DISPOSITION_CODE = CS.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = @Organiza.onID
SELECT es.SubjectId AS ApplicantId ,e.ID AS EventID ,e.StartDate ,e.EventTypeID ,Organiza.onId ,e.EventTypeOther ,et.[Type] as EventType INTO #Events FROM #Person p INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON (es.SubjectID = p.SecondaryId ) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.ID = es.EventID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId WHERE e.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onID AND e.EventSourceId = 2 --- OSS Pool
CREATE TABLE #EventVisibility ( EventID uniqueiden..er )
IF (@RecruiterId IS NOT NULL) BEGIN -- need to apply Event visibility .lter by recruiter
INSERT INTO #EventVisibility SELECT DISTINCT ce.EventID FROM #Events ce INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOwners] p ON ce.EventID = p.EventID WHERE OwnerID = @RecruiterId
--SELECT DISTINCT -- s.[SubjectId] as ProspectID --INTO #VisibleApplicant --FROM -- #EventVisibility ev -- INNER JOIN RssOss.[USMC].[EventSubject] s ON ev.EventID = s.EventId
INSERT INTO #Pool SELECT * FROM #Person p --WHERE -- p.RecruiterID = @RecruiterId OR -- p.ApplicantAssetID IN (SELECT ProspectID FROM #VisibleApplicant )
--DROP TABLE #VisibleApplicant
END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #Pool SELECT * FROM #Person END
INSERT INTO #NWA SELECT p.ApplicantAssetID, p.ApplicantAssetName, p.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, p.NWA_ID, eo.OwnerId AS RecruiterID, p.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, p.SecondaryId, p.Disposi.on, COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Recruiter, COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterShortName, p.CreateDate, e.EventID, e.StartDate AS NextScheduledEvent, p.source AS Source, p.sourceDual AS SourceDual, p.Gender ,e.EventTypeOther ,e.EventType FROM #Pool p INNER JOIN #Events e on e.ApplicantId = p.SecondaryId LEFT OUTER JOIN RssOss.[USMC].[EventOwners] eo ON e.EventID = eo.EventID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON eo.OwnerId = rp.rowguid INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] rcp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = rcp.PERSON_ID WHERE ( @EventTypeID IS NULL OR ( @EventTypeID IS NOT NULL AND e.EventTypeId = @EventTypeID)) AND (e.StartDate IN ( SELECT MIN(e2.StartDate) FROM #Events e2 WHERE (e2.ApplicantId = e.ApplicantId) AND e2.StartDate >= GetDate() ) OR @OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 0 ) AND ((LEFT(e.StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsStart, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(e.StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsEnd, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) )
IF (@RecruiterId IS NOT NULL) BEGIN -- need to apply Event visibility .lter by recruiter INSERT INTO #FinalResult SELECT DISTINCT nwa.* FROM #NWA nwa INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON es.SubjectID = nwa.SecondaryID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event e ON e.id = es.even.d
WHERE ((LEFT(e.StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsStart, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(e.StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsEnd, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) ) AND ( (nwa.EventID IS NULL) OR (nwa.EventID IS NOT NULL AND nwa.EventID IN (SELECT EventID FROM #EventVisibility )) --OR (RecruiterId = @RecruiterId AND @OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 1) ) END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #FinalResult SELECT DISTINCT nwa.* FROM #NWA nwa INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON es.SubjectID = nwa.SecondaryID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event e ON e.id = es.even.d WHERE ((LEFT(e.StartDate,11) >= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsStart, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) AND (LEFT(e.StartDate,11) <= Coalesce(@ScheduledEventsEnd, LEFT(e.StartDate,11))) )
END
SELECT f.*, (SELECT rp.rowguid as '@Recrui.ngPersonId', COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) as '@DisplayName' FROM RssOss.USMC.EventOwners eo INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Recrui.ng_Person rp ON rp.rowguid = eo.OwnerId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON rp.Recrui.ng_Person_ID = p.Person_ID WHERE EventId = f.EventID FOR XML PATH('Owner'), TYPE, ROOT('Owners') ) AS 'EventOwners'
FROM #FinalResult f
DROP TABLE #Events DROP TABLE #EventVisibility DROP TABLE #Pool DROP TABLE #NWA DROP TABLE #STATUS_DISPOSITION DROP TABLE #Person DROP TABLE #FinalResult
